doc:
Sandy Becker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandy_Becker 0 George Sanford Becker (February 19, 1922 – April 9, 1996), who was known professionally as Sandy Becker, was a television announcer, actor, and comedian who hosted several popular children's programs in New York City. The best known of these was The Sandy Becker Show, which ran from 1955 to 1968 on Channel 5 WABD-TV and WNEW-TV. George_Sanford_Becker ( February_19_,_1922 – April_9_,_1996 ) , who was_known professionally as Sandy_Becker , was a_television_announcer , actor , and comedian who hosted several_popular_children 's_programs in New_York_City . The_best_known of these was The_Sandy_Becker_Show , which ran from 1955 to 1968 on Channel_5_WABD-TV_and_WNEW-TV .
